article_title: Doctors Still Lag In Move To New Diagnosis Codes

article_metadata.description: Less than 10 percent of doctor practices have made “significant progress” when rating their overall readiness for tens of thousands of new government-mandated “ICD-10” codes used to describe diseases and hospital procedures in the insurance billing process, a new study shows. With less than 8 months to go before medical-care providers [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
